insights.populationGrowth: Moderate growth 1.0% with regional administrative center providing employment opportunities.
insights.educationLevel: Good 83% literacy as regional education hub for eastern Bhutan.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 52%, government 22%, services 15%, small industry 8%, crafts 3%.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional houses 60%, modern houses 35%, government housing 5%.

insights.temperature: Temperate to subtropical, mild winters (8°C), warm summers (26°C). Varied elevation zones.
insights.precipitation: High precipitation 1,800mm supporting diverse agriculture and forests.
insights.seasonality: Mild winter, hot pre-monsoon, intense monsoon, pleasant post-monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Monsoon flooding, landslides, hailstorms, crop pests.

recentEvents.impact: Town center flooded, administrative offices affected

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Medium - Regional administrative center with better resources

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Regional administrative and educational hub for eastern Bhutan
